full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'PHAGS PA KLU'I DBANG PHYUG RGYAL PO'I SGRUB THABS BUM SGRUB DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES 'PHAGS PA KLU'I DBANG PHYUG RGYAL PO'I SGRUB THABS BUM SGRUB DANG BCAS PA LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR SKYES PA'I GYI NA PA YE SHES SKAL @008A *, ,BZANG BAS ME TOG GI TSOM BU BKOD PA'I MDO DANG, KUN TU BZANG PO'I DUD DANG, 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB KYI GZHUNG DANG, RJE TSUL KHRIMS STOBS 'BAR 'OD ZER GYIS GSUNG SOGS LAS BTUS TE BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS SO, ,SEMS CAN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG ,)
